name: build-list

schema.title: Expo EAS Build List executor
schema.description: List all Expo Application Services (EAS) builds for your Expo project.

platform.description: The platform to build the app.

json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

interactive.description: Run the command in interactive mode.

appBuildVersion.description: App build version of EAS build

gitCommitHash.description: Git commit hash of EAS build

limit.description: Limit of numbers to list EAS builds

description: List all EAS builds for your Expo project
